title: Mondays With Mike: November 2014 Edition
teaser: November will be an exciting month for Wisconsin Public Radio programming. In this month’s edition of Mondays with Mike, Joy Cardin and WPR director Mike Crane preview coverage plans for election night and the days to follow, along with a special Thanksgiving Day lineup. Plus, they’ve got the latest on additional programming and WPR operations.
